name: autopilot
content:

a device that keeps aircraft, spacecraft, and ships moving in a particular direction without human involvement: The plane was on autopilot when it crashed.

TRANSPORT equipment on an aircraft or ship to make it continue to travel in the correct direction by itself without needing a person to control it: To shut off the autopilot and free other controls, the pilot must enter the commands into the onboard computers.
on autopilot
happening automatically or doing something automatically, without having to think about what you are doing: When your marketing is effective and running on autopilot, you can spend more time on the tasks you like to do.
